mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id as boardId, b.user_id as userId, b.board_type as boardType, b.title as title, b.content as content, b.report_count as reportCount, b.click_count as clickCount, b.local_si as localSi, b.local_gu as localGu, b.reg_date as regDate, b.`update` as `update`, w.board_walk_id as boardWalkId, w.walk_category as walkCategory FROM board AS b JOIN board_walk AS w ON b.board_id = w.board_id WHERE board_type = 1
